classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing, fine-tuning, and deploying LLM-based solutions for tasks like information extraction and question answering. It explicitly mentions prompt tuning, model fine-tuning, and LLM Ops, aligning directly with the core responsibilities and project examples of a GenAI Engineer.
